Title: Ukraine in the EU
Questions: Ukraine should become a member of the EU.

Title: Minimum wage
Questions: The EU should require all member states to introduce a nationally defined minimum wage.

Title: Asylum application at border
Questions: Asylum seekers must submit their application at the EU's external borders and await the outcome there.

Title: EU common army
Questions: The EU should have a common army.

Title: Facial recognition ban
Questions: The EU should ban the use of automated facial recognition by law enforcement.

Title: Budget deficit
Questions: The EU should allow member states to have a higher budget deficit.

Title: Eurobonds
Questions: The EU should be able to financially support member states with high levels of debt through Eurobonds.

Title: Nuclear energy
Questions: The EU should continue to recognize nuclear energy as a sustainable energy source.

Title: Pesticides
Questions: The EU should completely ban pesticides containing glyphosate.

Title: CO2 tax
Questions: Companies should pay more for their CO2 emissions.

Title: EU laws and values
Questions: The EU should continue to freeze its funding to member states that violate EU laws and values.

Title: GMOs
Questions: The EU should allow the cultivation of a greater number of genetically modified crops (GMOs).

Title: Intensive livestock farming
Questions: The EU should stop providing financial support for intensive livestock farming.

Title: Weapons for Ukraine
Questions: The EU should finance more weapons for Ukraine.

Title: Weapons to Israel
Questions: All EU member states should cease arms sales to Israel until the conflict is resolved.

Title: Development aid and asylum
Questions: The EU should limit development aid to countries that do not take back rejected asylum seekers.

Title: Permanent border controls
Questions: Permanent border controls should be reinstated between all EU member states.

Title: Third gender category in passports
Questions: The EU should recommend that member states add a third gender category to their passports.

Title: Unanimity in the European Council
Questions: Unanimity in the European Council should no longer be mandatory in the decision-making process.

Title: Environmental impact label
Questions: All food products sold in the EU should be labeled with an environmental impact label.

Title: Erasmus+ scholarships
Questions: Students with fewer resources should be able to obtain a higher Erasmus+ scholarship than students with more resources.

Title: Legalization of cannabis
Questions: The EU should facilitate the legalization of cannabis for recreational use among its member states.

Title: Cultivated meat
Questions: The EU should ban the production and sale of cell-based cultivated meat.

Title: Solar panels on new buildings
Questions: The installation of photovoltaic systems should become mandatory for the construction of new residential buildings in the EU.

Title: Combustion engines
Questions: Vehicles with combustion engines should continue to be registered in the EU even after 2035.

Title: Aid to UNRWA
Questions: The EU should discontinue funding the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees (UNRWA).

Title: Sanctions on Russia
Questions: EU sanctions against Russia should be lifted.

Title: Disarmament policies
Questions: The EU's foreign policy should prioritize disarmament.

Title: Access to abortion rights
Questions: The EU should work to ensure that abortion can be performed freely and easily in all member states.

Title: Same-sex marriage
Questions: Same-sex marriages performed in the EU should be recognized in all member states.
